title: A Credit Card that Let's You Pick Your Own Rewards
description: Link for teaser title:  https://www.wisebread.com/compare/pxd-2024-aug-bofa-customized-cash-rewards-revi... Enhanced options to earn 3% cash back based on Bank of America customer feedback. Maximize your rewards with 3% cash back in the category of your choice — including online shopping.
author: webmaster
excerpt: Enhanced options to earn 3% cash back based on Bank of America customer feedback. Maximize your rewards with 3% cash back in the category of your choice — including online shopping.
text: Advertiser Disclosure: Many of the credit card offers that appear on the website are from credit card companies from which Wise Bread receives compensation. This compensation may impact how and where products appear on this site (including, for example, the order in which they appear). This site does not include all credit card companies or all available credit card offers. © 2024 Wise Bread | About | Contact User Agreement | Privacy Policy
html:
Advertiser Disclosure: Many of the credit card offers that appear on the website are from credit card companies from which Wise Bread receives compensation. This compensation may impact how and where products appear on this site (including, for example, the order in which they appear). This site does not include all credit card companies or all available credit card offers.
